channel.title: Full lunar spellbook on a 317?
channel.description:
Yes, well i'm going to add full lunar spellbook to a 317, the cheap way (not loading 474 anims, models, ect)
Why: Bored, something cool to add to your server.
Base: Choosing between 317 Deob and Galkon's refractored
What have i done so far? So far i have:
[b]COMPLETE[/b] Vengeance (including Veng-other) - Emotes and Gfx - Theres tutorials for this one
Humidify
[b]ANIMATIONS[/b] NPC Contact(Anim only need GFX/model for it)
Every GFX dumped and animated correctly (Except npc contact)
[b]GFX[/b] Bake pie
Cure plant
String Jewelry
(i have 4-5 others i have no idea what they are)
[b]WANNA HELP? POST ON THIS TOPIC IF YOU KNOW ANY ANIMATION ID'S OR GFX ID'S (I Will give you this entire package if you even help)[/b]
Also, if you have lunar on real runescape, tell me whats what (when vid is up)
[b]Video and pictures are coming soon. Just wait :P[/b]
Credits: SWAT - Dumped animations Harry/Blood Isle - GFX dump Sir Stewie - Lunar Interface Whoever dumped 474 models Me for putting it together.
